meanings.definition: A family of beetles known for their ability to jump when disturbed.
meanings.sent1: The elaterids in the garden startled me by suddenly leaping into the air.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study elaterids to understand how they jump so high.
meanings.sent3: The elaterids decided to have a jumping competition to see who could jump the farthest.
meanings.sent4: Watching the elaterids jump was like witnessing tiny acrobats in action.
meanings.sent5: Children love to catch elaterids and watch them spring away.

meanings.definition: Members of the family Elateridae, characterized by their click mechanism for jumping.
meanings.sent1: The elaterids in the field made clicking sounds as they prepared to jump.
meanings.sent2: Farmers appreciate the elaterids for their natural pest control abilities.
meanings.sent3: The elaterids organized a band where they played music by clicking in rhythm.
meanings.sent4: The elaterids' clicking mechanism is like a built-in pogo stick for them.
meanings.sent5: The forest was alive with the sounds of elaterids clicking and jumping around.

meanings.definition: Beetles belonging to the Elateridae family, commonly referred to as click beetles.
meanings.sent1: I found an elaterids beetle in the garden and marveled at its jumping skills.
meanings.sent2: Elaterids are fascinating creatures with their unique ability to propel themselves into the air.
meanings.sent3: The elaterids threw a party to celebrate their famous clicking reputation.
meanings.sent4: The elaterids' clicking mechanism is like a secret code they use to communicate.
meanings.sent5: The children giggled as they watched the elaterids click and bounce around the yard.
